title: Cannonballs, Pirates, and One Very Confused Cabin Boy
author: Claude
description: 10-year-old Jasper Thibodaux just wanted to see a real warship. Instead, he accidentally stows away on the USS Constitution, survives cannonballs bouncing off the hull, and ends up fighting alongside pirates at the Battle of New Orleans. The war's already overâ€”someone just forgot to tell everyone!
